headline: Mondelez to invest $77m in Swiss Toblerone factory
summary: The confectionery giant wants to meet growing demand in the premium segment.

raw.headline: Mondelez to invest $77m in Swiss Toblerone factory
raw.summary: The confectionery giant wants to meet growing demand in the premium segment.

headline: Home and Heart of global Toblerone Production: Mondelz International invests ~65 million Swiss Francs (CHF) in its Toblerone manufacturing facility in Switzerland
summary: BERN, Switzerland, April 10, 2025--Mondelz International (Nasdaq: MDLZ) has today announced a significant investment of ~ 65 million swiss francs in its Toblerone manufacturing facility in Switzerland. With this investment, the company is creating a global centre of excellence for Toblerone in Bern (Switzerland) from where the brand and chocolate expertise is exported all over the world. The investment is a clear commitment to the location where this traditional brand was founded back in 1908 a
